channel.title: PI error help
channel.description: I did change things in my Commands.java when i tried to complie iam getting this. I tried to fix it i cant. [code]src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:611: error: bad operand types for binary operator '&&' if (playerCommand.startsWith("item") && (c.playerRights = 5)) { ^ first type: boolean second type: int Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error[/code]

item.title: PI error help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“item”) && (c.playerRights = 5))
You’ve got too many parenthesis. It doesn’t know what you’re second check is after the ‘and’

Also, when using integers in if/else statements, you need to use ==, <=, >=, <, or >.

Read full topic

item.title: PI error help
item.dc:creator: @Evoo Evoo
item.description:
@Evoo wrote:

I did change things in my Commands.java when i tried to complie iam getting this. I tried to fix it i cant.

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:611: error: bad operand types for binary operator '&&' if (playerCommand.startsWith("item") && (c.playerRights = 5)) { ^ first type: boolean second type: int Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error

Read full topic
